messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: with or without kids
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/3/03 6:50:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I was just wondering if you get negative comments from other moms that don t use a sitter?
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/3/03 6:50:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
sjogy@... writes:

> Pam, I wasn't sure what your question was about, though? Do people
> comment badly on my leaving the kids? Positively?
>
>

I was just wondering if you get negative comments from other moms that don't
use a sitter? Although I guess using a sitter is probably more the norm.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: with or without kids
messages.msgSnippet: on 7/3/03 5:31 PM, Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com at ... Yup. Pam, I wasn t sure what your question was about, though? Do people comment badly on my
messages.messageBody:
on 7/3/03 5:31 PM, Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> I think the key is how the kids feel about it. If yours were happy, great.


Yup. Pam, I wasn't sure what your question was about, though? Do people
comment badly on my leaving the kids? Positively?

p.
